{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|TaggedType}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/ranges/utility|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept bool TaggedType = /* implementation-defined */;
}}

The concept {{tt|TaggedType&lt;T&gt;}} is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} is a unary function type of the form {{tt|R(A)}}, where {{tt|R}} is a {{rconcept|TagSpecifier}}.

Such types are used with the convenience alias templates {{tt|tagged_tuple}} and {{tt|tagged_pair}}.
